hook: [mysterious] What if I told you 297 years of our history might be a total fabrication? Some theorists claim the early Middle Ages, from 614 to 911 AD, never actually happened! Historians like Heribert Illig argue this was a deliberate deception, possibly by the Holy Roman Empire to legitimize its rule.
description: Could 297 years of history be a lie? Discover the shocking Phantom Time Hypothesis! #HistoryMystery #PhantomTime #LostYears
